name: Bullet Hell (DawsonPeloqinSheridan)
description:
-"Bullet Hell" is a two-player game on the same device.

-Player one controls and aims the cannon with the mouse, using the left mouse button to fire a bullet.

-Player two uses the A and D keys to move left and right, and SPACE to jump. 

-Player one's goal is to kill player two before time runs out

-Player two's goal is to avoid getting shot or falling off the platforms until time runs out.

Hope you enjoy the game!
